channel.title: Colored Whips PI
channel.description: This is either a server sided or client sided problem or maybe both so i just posted in server help. Basically I added the ints into my itemdef.java and I added the codes into my itemcfg. Compiled no errors. but for some reason when I spawn in the whips nothing appears in my inventory. Please help me :s

item.title: Colored Whips PI
item.dc:creator: @defer48 defer48
item.description:
@defer48 wrote:

whackatre:

Not sure if this applies to your case, but on some servers, item ID’s over 15999 cannot be spawned using your base’s default pickup command. Try changing it.

Thanks man it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Colored Whips PI
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

Not sure if this applies to your case, but on some servers, item ID’s over 15999 cannot be spawned using your base’s default pickup command. Try changing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Colored Whips PI
item.dc:creator: @defer48 defer48
item.description:
@defer48 wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:8, topic:433782”][quote author=defer48 link=topic=536497.msg3922941#msg3922941 date=1329916359]

[code]case 16000:
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wield”;
itemDef.name = “White whip”; //Name
itemDef.description = “A white whip.”.getBytes();
itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[2];
itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[2];
itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 528;
itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 100;
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 280;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -1;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56;
itemDef.modelID = 5412;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 5409;
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 5409;
itemDef.modelZoom = 840;
break;

item.title: Colored Whips PI
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“NotLikingThis, post:4, topic:433782”]Well that is most likely the reason nothing is showing up. If you don’t have any “image”(model) for it to load then it wont show up.
I have never added colored whips as I don’t really see the point in having them in the first place if you don’t have construction added so the person can color them when they get the construction level.(At least I wouldn’t)
I would look to see if there is models for it.[/quote]
You don’t need models to recolor whips.

Read full topic

item.title: Colored Whips PI
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

Well that is most likely the reason nothing is showing up. If you don’t have any “image”(model) for it to load then it wont show up.
I have never added colored whips as I don’t really see the point in having them in the first place if you don’t have construction added so the person can color them when they get the construction level.(At least I wouldn’t)
I would look to see if there is models for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Colored Whips PI
item.dc:creator: @defer48 defer48
item.description:
@defer48 wrote:

This is either a server sided or client sided problem or maybe both so i just posted in server help. Basically I added the ints into my itemdef.java and I added the codes into my itemcfg. Compiled no errors. but for some reason when I spawn in the whips nothing appears in my inventory. Please help me :s
